# wcs-skeleton-circle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Use a skeleton circle as a placeholder round images, illustrations or components

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                              | Type                           | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | --------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | Specifies the animation of the skeleton  | `"glide" \| "none" \| "pulse"` | `'glide'` |
| `radius`    | `radius`    | Specifies the radius of the circle in px | `number`                       | `50`      |

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
